name: Friday Night Funkin Infection mod
description:
Story: BF and GF is searching for love elsewere where Daddy Dearest wont find them. [love as in private convisation for marriage]

but BF and GF encountered a hurt man. full with Cringe Virus. 

After the first song he also has a Cat Virus with him too. the infection is hell on the Internet!

After the second song GF and BF found a virus

who infects, BF and GF are imune to the viruses because they are real and stuck in the video game.

after the third song BF and GF got shot out of the video game. causing them to bleed Daddy Dearist and Mommy Mearist came. Mommy Mearist called 9/11 and took them to the

Doctors, the doctor accused the video game violence but BF desided to beep, GF translated the truth. the end
